solution_line_template: The pool holds {pool_capacity_gallons} gallons of water because {fill_time_hours} x {hose_flow_rate_gph} = <<{fill_time_hours}*{hose_flow_rate_gph}={pool_capacity_gallons}>>{pool_capacity_gallons}

It costs ${total_cost_dollars} to fill the pool because {pool_capacity_gallons} x ${cost_per_gallon_dollars} = $<<{pool_capacity_gallons}*{cost_per_gallon_dollars}={total_cost_dollars}>>{total_cost_dollars}
